summary: Transforms a DAG representing a quantum circuit by synthesizing abstract mathematical objects, annotated operations, and custom gates into primitive gates that are directly supported by a specified target or equivalence library, using configurable synthesis plugins and methods.
business_intent: Automates the conversion of high‑level quantum constructs into hardware‑compatible gate sets during transpilation, allowing users to control synthesis strategies via configuration while optionally preserving custom gate definitions when no target or basis gates are provided.
